'''Paris Paloma''' is a singer-songwriter from Derbyshire, England. She wrote the original single [[The R⁯ider]] for the soundtrack for [[The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim]].<ref>[https://x.com/wbpictures/status/1852380079386698003 Announcement post] on X.com (retrieved 04 November 2024)</ref>
